changeSet.author: alex.kuznetsov

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from product.user where name = 'user1'

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO product.user (id, name, surname, middlename, nickname, email, password, user_type_id) VALUES (nextval('product.user_seq'), 'user1', 'user1 surname', 'user1 middlename', 'user1', 'user1@mail.ru', '$2a$10$XJVMrYZw4z1K7CjSKBNKjuluWNarRnJaZZF0EUrm0o/b2VfwcjoyS', 1 );
